verses.roman:
eta bali' āge cale yamunāra kūle
dekhe,--tāhāṅ kṛṣṇa haya kadambera tale

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; āge cale—go forward; yamunāra kūle—onto the beach by the Yamunā; dekhe—they see; tāhāṅ—there; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; haya—is present; kadambera tale—underneath a kadamba tree.
translation: "Saying this, the gopīs stepped onto the beach by the Yamunā River. There they saw Lord Kṛṣṇa beneath a kadamba tree.
